subject: Taxation
Federal Taxes (US)
Boxing
lead_paragraph: With the Internal Revenue Service poised to take the money from his $10 million purse for his fight Saturday, Floyd Mayweather Jr. agreed to pay $5.6 million in back taxes. Mayweather’s tax lawyer, Jeffrey Morse, said Mayweather had met all his tax obligations.
